scripts.report-t: npm run report:merge & npm run report:generate
scripts.cy:run: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/regression/**.js --config video=false --env configFile=qa
scripts.cypress:run: npx cypress run --headless --spec cypress/e2e/regression/**.js --config video=false --env configFile=prod
scripts.report: npm run cy:run ; npm run report:merge ; npm run report:generate ; npm run report:copyScreenshots
scripts.report:prod: npm run cypress:run ; npm run report:merge ; npm run report:generate:prod ; npm run report:copyScreenshots:prod
scripts.login: npx cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config video=false --spec cypress/e2e/regression/login.cy.js
scripts.login:prod: npx cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config video=false --spec cypress/e2e/regression/login.cy.js --env configFile=prod
scripts.report:firstPromoter: npm run cy:firstPromoter ; npm run report:merge ; npm run report:generate:prod ; npm run report:copyScreenshots:prod
scripts.cy:smoke:prod: npx cypress run --headless --config video=false --spec cypress/e2e/smoke/prod.smoke*.js --env configFile=prod
scripts.report:prod:smoke: npm run cy:smoke:prod ; npm run report:merge ; npm run report:generate:smoke ; npm run report:copyScreenshots:smoke
